snippet.title: Castlevania: Lord of Shadow Trailer - Mirror of Fate - E3 2012
snippet.description:
Don't be scared, look into the mirror and see what you are up against.

Head over to IGN for more Castlevania:
http://www.ign.com/games/castlevania-lords-of-shadow/xbox-360-14275421

Subscribe to IGN's channel for reviews, news, and all things gaming: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=ignentertainment
